page.title: 20Newquay School-Credits
page.content:
Newquay School is an 11-18 Comprehensive with approximateley 1700 pupils.The buildings are light and modern with two corridors above ground level.It was built in the late 1960's.
Thanks are due to: Mr J.G.Robertson,the Headmaster Mr R.A.Stansfield,Head of Computer Applications,who coordinated and typed in all the work. Mr N.R.Jackson,History Department Mr C.R.Roberts,Head of Geography, for all his work on Land Cover and Statistics.
All pupils in Years One and Two for filling in questionnaires.
Mr Stansfield's Computer Studies class,especially Ben Bussey,Karensa Fuller and Mark Fairhurst.
